dublin_core.dcvalue: The planning and installation of a telemedicine system for communication within a teaching hospital and its academic and hospital units with a capacity for accommodation of up to 400 video stations is described The system is intended for improving the communication between patients and health professionals and between the health professionals themselves It also provides the basis for improving pre graduate teaching especially problem based learning and all aspects of postgraduate teaching
Wiring a medical school and teaching hospital for telemedicine.
